hcm.ssj.core

Class SensorChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hcm.ssj.core.Component
      • hcm.ssj.core.Provider
        • hcm.ssj.core.SensorChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccelerationChannel, AccelerationChannel, AccelerationChannel, AltimeterChannel, AndroidSensorChannel, AudioChannel, BarometerChannel, BatteryChannel, BeaconChannel, BluetoothChannel, BluetoothPressureMatChannel, BrightnessChannel, BVPAndisChannel, BVPAngelChannel, BVPBLEChannel, BVPChannel, CaloriesChannel, CameraChannel, CPULoadChannel, DistanceChannel, DynAccelerationChannel, ECGChannel, EDAChannel, EMGChannel, EMGChannel, FFMPEGReaderChannel, FileReaderChannel, GenericChannel, GPSChannel, GSRChannel, GSRChannel, GyroscopeChannel, HeartRateChannel, IBIChannel, IBIChannel, ImageLoaderChannel, InfraredChannel, LUXChannel, PedometerChannel, PulseChannel, SkinTempChannel, SocketChannel, TemperatureChannel

    public abstract class SensorChannel
extends Provider
    Component handling data stream of a sensor device. Requires a valid sensor instance (to handle the connection to the physical device)
